page.title: 09LOCAL RESIDENT
page.content: Mr Toogood has lived here for 70 years. Mr Toogood used to live in Holly Farm in Norton Green, he described his house, with no electric, no gas - only half a candle to last for a fortnight. Mr Toogood now lives in Beamend in Windmill Lane. He went to school in with the Army. Mr Toogood had lessons like English, Latin, History, Geography and Reading about war. Mr Toogood wore several uniforms like Scouts, St. John's ambulance and choir. Mr Toogood is the author of West Wight Remembered.
